projects.title: Andrea Oliva Architetto
projects.description: Built a complete website for architectural studio Andrea Oliva, showcasing projects and services. My first major web development project that taught me the power of bringing creative visions to life.

experiences.description:
• Manage 30-80 tickets monthly (incidents, requests, and support) across DAM, PIM, SRM, and B2B/B2C platforms, working alongside two senior team members
• Gather and translate business requirements from IT and business users into technical specifications for external development teams
• Execute manual functional testing on ~2 releases per month, identifying an average of 6 bugs per release cycle to ensure software stability
• Provide first-level technical support to IT team for platform credentials and data inquiries, and to business users for assistance and feature requests
• Modify and maintain Python and PL/SQL codebase for data integration and workflow automation (~15% of responsibilities)
• Selected to lead 2 AI-focused projects in 2025 (AI-generated product descriptions/translations and image generation) under senior DAM manager mentorship

• Developed Python automation tool to extract and preprocess Excel data for ERP integration, eliminating manual data entry process
• Worked on internal framework development
• Gained hands-on experience with enterprise software systems
